activities: Xact Data Discovery is an international discovery and data management company providing streamlined forensic, processing, hosting, document review, project management, imaging & coding and paper discovery services to law firms, corporations and government agencies.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line and Off-line data, HR Data, client-data, customer-data. may be manually processed.
privacyprograms:
XDD frequently enters into court and client requested non-disclosure and confidentiality agreements that routinely surpass state and federal guidelines.

XDD houses all data in a Safe Harbor Compliant data center.

XDD complies with:
* Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996 (HIPAA)
* Payment Card Industry (PCI) Standards
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); for all other data XDD utilizes PrivacyTrust, an independent third party dispute resolution service. They can be contacted here: http://www.privacytrust.org/complaint/raise_privacy_complaint.php?c=xdd
